questiontext.text: Which random variable X is a discrete variable?  I A soccer team plays 12 games in a given season. Suppose X is the number of games that this team won.Ê II A woman buys a lottery ticket every week in which the probability of winning of 1 euro is 1/10. Suppose X is her winnings after one year.Ê. III A student waits for a bus to pass by every ten minutes. Suppose X is the number of minutes he waits at the bus stop.

answer.text: I and II are discrete variables.

feedback.text: I and II are discrete variables…: Correct

answer.text: I and III are discrete variables.

feedback.text: I and III are discrete variables…: Incorrect

answer.text: II and III are discrete variables.

feedback.text: II and III are discrete variables…: Incorrect

answer.text: All of them are discrete variables.

feedback.text: They are all discrete variables…: Incorrect

answer.text: None of them are discrete variables.

feedback.text: None of them are discrete variables…: Incorrect
